com.soen.risk.startegies

Class RiskAggressiveStartegy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.startegies.RiskAggressiveStartegy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiskPlayerStrategy, java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskAggressiveStartegy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RiskPlayerStrategy, java.io.Serializable

    Risk Aggressive Strategy

    The Class RiskAggressiveStartegy strategy that focuses on attack (reinforces its strongest country, then always attack with it until it cannot attack anymore, then fortifies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country).
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Yogesh Nimbhorkar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
